alert.note: Alert for Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 3:58PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Nassau, Camden, southwestern Glynn, southeastern Brantley and northeastern Charlton Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 357 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking outflow from a line of thunderstorms extending from 8 miles south of Race Pond to 6 miles northeast of Kings Bay Base. Movement was south at 15 mph. Winds of 35 to 45 mph are expected with the outflow boundary ahead of the line. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... St. Marys, Kingsland, Brunswick, St. Simons Island, Fernandina Beach, Hilliard, Folkston, Woodbine, Nahunta and Dock Junction. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for southeastern Georgia.
